name: Caving And Spelunking
description: Beneath the Mayan jungle of Playa del Carmen lies a labyrinth of limestone caverns and underwater rivers that few will ever see.  The wonders of these caves, called cenotes in Mayan, are still being discovered every day.  The cenotes are perhaps the greatest natural treasure of the Yucatan, and this tour takes you there.  Prepare to be amazed by the power of nature, the beauty of these creations of time, and the incredible clarity of the secret river, Rio Secreto.
